1370: Sara was born in Breestraat in 1370.
Got married to Gherbrandus at age 23 in 1370.
Gave birth to Reymodis in 1370 at age 23.
1371: Gave birth to Lotijn in 1371 at age 24.
1372: Gave birth to Riet in 1372 at age 25.
Lost daughter Reymodis when Reymodis was 3 years old.
1375: Gave birth to Woltwigis in 1375 at age 28.
1377: Gave birth to Alem in 1377 at age 30.
Lost daughter Woltwigis when Woltwigis was 3 years old.
1378: Gave birth to Liudburgis in 1378 at age 31.
1380: Gave birth to Aue in 1380 at age 33.
Lost daughter Aue when Aue was 1 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1381: Gave birth to Heylewigis in 1381 at age 34.
